name: Go West - Pico-8
description:
Go West is a short RPG created with Pico-8 where the goal is to go west.

Use arrow keys to move, use x to start and dismiss dialogs. Enjoy!

First released in Jan 2017

by David St-Onge

Mentions:
-Base code from collide.p8 by Zep
-Wall and actor collisions by Zep
-Moutain scene copied from Jelpi by Zep
-Fade function code from Jelpi by Zep
-House scene copied from Stroll by Parlor Interactive
-Hero sprite and warrior in the logo are heavily inspired by sprites by Shaturu711
